name: Knight Guy: The Curse of the Seriously Evil, Evil Doers
storyline:
One day, an evil demon lord attacks the kingdom and transforms the knights into evil monsters, it is up to Knaight the squire to don the armor and weapons of a knight to become, the Knight Guy.

Knight Guy must now enter the castle, fight against hordes of monsters and his own friends, save the princess (of course) and defeat the seriously evil, evil doers!
summary:
Knight Guy, is retro arcade game in development made lovingly with pixel art.

Knight Guy will feature both an arcade and story mode.
